rules.fullName: Jamaica Pre Sales Request to Bid Team

criteriaItems.value: GSM New Contract,GSM Contract Resign,GSM RFQ/RFP,GSM Addendum

rules.description: Jamaica Pre Sales Request routes to the Jamaica Bid Team queue when PSR Type is "Corporate Mobile" & Solution Type is any of the following "GSM New Contract, GSM Contract Resign, GSM RFQ/REP, GSM Addendum"

rules.description: Notification Pre Sales request is now complete

rules.fullName: PS Engineer Assigned
PSR - Name Auto Population
rules.description:
This rule merges the PSR record type name and the Opp name to be added to the "Subject" field.
This was originally handled by this WF rule and then co-opted for an Apex trigger. The Apex has caused several issues and is now inactive
